Name Gloss Substance
Transcription
Description An unbounded physical entity
Closest FrameNet Frame(s) Substance
Maps to IARPA Source Concept(s)
Other aliases
Comments a substance is an internally undifferentiated entity, often of indeterminate bounding
Family Entity frames
Tags
Type Cog
Cultural Scope American English, Mexican Spanish
Cultural Information checked cultural scope for English and Spanish - Karie July 8 2014
